feed.title: Security Advisory for .NET packages hosted at the NuGet Gallery
feed.subtitle: Security Advisory for .NET packages hosted at the NuGet Gallery on GitHub

entry.title: [Microsoft.ChakraCore] ChakraCore RCE Vulnerability
entry.content:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that the Chakra scripting engine handles objects in memory in Microsoft Edge, aka "Chakra Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Edge, ChakraCore. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2018-0943, CVE-2018-8133, CVE-2018-8145, CVE-2018-8177.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2018-8130
  • https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2018-8130
  • https://github.com/chakra-core/ChakraCore/commit/bee1e247bf6acbc8c862c7fc1d597ce9cab7446e
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210124164256/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/103981
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20211204185256/http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1040844
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-3fvw-g6mr-w247

entry.title: [Microsoft.ChakraCore] ChakraCore RCE Vulnerability
entry.content:
ChakraCore and Microsoft Edge in Microsoft Windows 10 1511, 1607, 1703, 1709, and Windows Server 2016 allows remote code execution, due to how the Chakra scripting engine handles objects in memory, aka "Chakra Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability". This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2018-0872, CVE-2018-0874, CVE-2018-0930, CVE-2018-0931, CVE-2018-0933, CVE-2018-0934, CVE-2018-0936, and CVE-2018-0937.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2018-0873
  • https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2018-0873
  • https://github.com/chakra-core/ChakraCore/commit/024353a0019ddd845ac889deb8b4714df2122836
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20201021051922/http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1040507
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210124144654/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/103268
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-wc52-2xwv-h7xr

entry.title: [Microsoft.ChakraCore] ChakraCore RCE Vulnerability
entry.content:
ChakraCore and Microsoft Edge in Microsoft Windows 10 Gold, 1511, 1607, 1703, 1709, and Windows Server 2016 allows remote code execution, due to how the Chakra scripting engine handles objects in memory, aka "Chakra Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability". This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2018-0872, CVE-2018-0873, CVE-2018-0930, CVE-2018-0931, CVE-2018-0933, CVE-2018-0934, CVE-2018-0936, and CVE-2018-0937.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2018-0874
  • https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2018-0874
  • https://github.com/chakra-core/ChakraCore/commit/7087c314a67631a0a3094bc2f741991ee10f5b5a
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20201021051922/http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1040507
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210124144659/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/103269
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-67f9-qmg7-fmcq

entry.title: [Microsoft.ChakraCore] ChakraCore RCE Vulnerability
entry.content:
ChakraCore allows remote code execution, due to how the ChakraCore scripting engine handles objects in memory, aka "Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability". This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2018-0876, CVE-2018-0889, CVE-2018-0893, and CVE-2018-0935.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2018-0925

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-5q2v-52gc-4w7p

entry.title: [Microsoft.ChakraCore] ChakraCore information disclosure vulnerability
entry.content:
ChakraCore and Microsoft Edge in Windows 10 1703 and 1709 allow information disclosure, due to how the scripting engine handles objects in memory, aka "Scripting Engine Information Disclosure Vulnerability". This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2018-0891.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2018-0939
  • https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2018-0939
  • https://github.com/chakra-core/ChakraCore/commit/090277e7a5ea1d938777acb92e7b6759936ea974
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20201021051922/http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1040507
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210124145017/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/103305
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-xgcc-r2f3-rq6p
